extendedInfo.description: BSPlayer FREE is top hardware accelerated video player for Android smartphones and tablet PCs.Main features:- Android 4.3 Jelly Bean MR2 compatibility- multi-core (dual and quad-core) HW decoding support - significantly improves playback speed- background playback in popup window (long tap on button Back to playback video and audio in popup video)- hardware accelerated video playback - increases speed and reduces battery consumption*- Support for almost all media files (video and audio player), such as: avi, divx, flv, mkv, mov, mpg, mts, mp4, m4v, rmvb, wmv, 3gp, mp3, flac... and streaming content such as RTMP, RTSP, MMS (tcp, http), HTTP Live stream, HTTP.- Multiple audio streams and subtitles.- Playlist support and various playback modes.- External and embedded subtitles ssa/ass, srt, sub. txt...- Find subtitles automatically (mobile data or wi-fi must be enabled to work)- Playback media files such as videos and mp3's directly via Wi-Fi from your network shared drives/folders (such as external USB drives, Samba (SMB/CIFS) shared drives, PC shared folders, NAS servers (Synology and others)) - no need to convert video files and copy media files to SD card anymore! - Playback files directly from uncompressed RAR files- Lock screen to prevent accidental change of videos (kid lock)- support for USB OTG (On-The-Go)for example: Nexus media importer, USB OTG Helper, USB Host Controller... and much more!This package includes support for ARMv7 with VFP and NEON. For other CPU types please download appropriate package. Application will notify you which package you need.BSPlayer FREE version is ad-supported video player. BSPlayer full version without advertisements with added functionality is available on Google Play.NOTE: When reporting error please add info about your smartphone brand and model. Also you can send us more detailed bug report on e-mail android@bsplayer.com. We are trying to improve the player for the users and your feedback is appreciated.This software uses code of FFmpeg licensed under the LGPLv2.1 and its source can be downloaded from BSPlayer website.Dedicated forum can be found here: http://forum.bsplayer.com/bsplayer-android/.*Hardware acceleration support depends on device video decoder capability. Hardware accelerated playback in portrait mode may be corrupted on some HTC models (HD and others - hardware issue). Also on some devices (Samsung galaxy S2) zoom/stretch may not work on all video types.Translations and corrections of the translations can now be submitted here: http://crowdin.net/project/bsplayer-android!Don't forget to vote 5 stars if you like it and if you don't - let us know why! :) Tags: video player, movie player, m2ts player, mts player, avc player, mp3 player, avi player, mkv player, mov player, flv player, subtitle player, free player...

reviews.title: Not working?
reviews.comment: Ever since the update, it keeps closing when I try to select something. It just goes back to the home screen and no matter what I do, it doesn\'t play.
reviews.author: Molly Herrmann

reviews.title: Issues since update
reviews.comment: Since the last update,  a alrge number of video\'s no longer stream thtough bs player. These files have worked for me in the past, but now bs player error message appears whenever I try to watch them.
reviews.author: Andrew McLagan

reviews.title: Plays nothing. Sucks. Uninstall.
reviews.comment: Aptly named BullShitPlayer. Installed it because it was supposed to play .mts. It did, without sound. Lately, though, whatever I choose, it just shuts down. Waste of time.
reviews.author: Tauno Kelder

reviews.title: Eric Athroll
reviews.comment: It works well on my Nexus 7 Tablet and my partner\'s Samsung Tab2 Tablet.  I was pleased that this app would play so many different formats but I wish it could be set to play a single video only once as I couldn\'t find a setting that would allow it to do this.
reviews.author: Eric Athroll

reviews.title: Galaxy s3
reviews.comment: Guys got my sole mate i mean searched so many players but this player do the thing. It plays mkv videod very smoothly thanx to its hw decoders  .its amazingly plz try and support the developer
reviews.author: Malik Junaid

reviews.title: No sound
reviews.comment: Out of the 24 avi files it played 2 . And they had no sound , like the format but needs more codecs for avi , thought I had found  good player  , anyone recommend a good avi player for my xoom
reviews.author: Tony Dean

reviews.title: Nice! But needed DTS support.
reviews.comment: When can you guys solve the MKV file sound issue? Can\'t play mkv files with sound in hardware decode mode. Searched online, showing it is caused by DTS not supported.
reviews.author: Ficus Zheng

reviews.title: Asus Nexus 7 2013
reviews.comment: This is the ONLY player I\'ve installed that can play all formats of video playback. Not Mobo, not MX, not Google. Great job!
reviews.author: Darwin Dayan

reviews.title: No longer allows smb shares
reviews.comment: I updated my phone. So installed current player. Can add my smb share but cant navigate through it. Had an old version on the old phone updated to latest and could navigate share. Deleted the share on the old phone and tried to readd it. Has the same problem.
reviews.author: Jase Rieger

reviews.title: Doesn\'t work
reviews.comment: Since the last two updates... The player does not open any files at all except mp3s... Please fix this issue is 1 of the best player on the android market
reviews.author: Indra Chauhan

reviews.title: This is best one!
reviews.comment: It includes subtitle and is perfect for the deaf people! I use this with my NZB PC server network for movies. I love it!
reviews.author: Brett Siteman

reviews.comment: I found that it is note the best but it is still better then mix player
reviews.author: Amber Conner

reviews.title: Beats mx in functionality n features
reviews.comment: but slower navigation, mx is better in this respect, plz improve
reviews.author: Vicky Maan

reviews.title: Plays nearly everything
reviews.comment: Works great, no complaints!
reviews.author: Ryan Raven

reviews.title: Poor
reviews.comment: It still freezes and don\'t open all the videos.
reviews.author: Shomari Mitchell

reviews.comment: No reviews given!

reviews.title: Not working well after last update.
reviews.comment: UPDATE: 2-September-2013_________________________________________ Used to be the best video player hands down. But for the last few weeks it\'s giving a lot of problem...  Will try again after sometime again. ______________________________________________________________________________ I have been using MX Player for long time, and didn\'t really believe this player could actually perform better, esp with my old Galaxy S. But really surprised to see how snappy it is in terms of seeking time! I can move to any part of the video almost instantly!   Only gripe is that the UI is quite dated, if it becomes at least like MX Player, I will come back and make it a 5 star!  Keep up the great work!!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: What an App!!
reviews.comment: respect for BS player. this app gives you all you want in a small package, plays a vast number of formats, downloads subs for u, all u have to do is keep quiet and watch. have not used it much to get but i think i just found the 1.
reviews.author: Uyapo Boepetswe

reviews.title: Such a pity, understandable, but...
reviews.comment: Understandable audio problems, but still can\'t hear what I want, which brings this app to a semi-useless level for me. Will re-install if I happen to come across this player again and this is fixed.
reviews.author: Ant\303\263nio Meneses

reviews.title: Nice..
reviews.comment: My go to app for playing videos. It plays all of my video formats no problem(vp8/flv mainly) with little to no erros. My drawbacks are the fact the app scans my entire sd card for videos and music. I would like to see an option that allowed me to exclude certain folders. Some folders aren\'t even media types to begin with so why are they being scanned as if they are? Also, it would be nice to see a menu setting like vplayer or mx player. I will purchase and give 5 stars if the dev ever made this happen.
reviews.author: jordan anderson
